snippet: The boy band Mindless Behavior is an African-American answer to British groups like the Wanted and One Direction. But its lack of success reflects how thoroughly black styles have been absorbed into pop.
abstract: Jon Caramanica observes that lack of success of African-American boy band Mindless Behavior reflects how thoroughly black styles have been absorbed into pop.
lead_paragraph: The boy band Mindless Behavior is an African-American answer to British groups like the Wanted and One Direction. But its lack of success reflects how thoroughly black styles have been absorbed into pop.

headline.seo: Mindless Behavior, an Old-Style Boy Band
headline.main: An Old-Style Boy Band, With Modern Wooing
headline.print_headline: An Old-Style Boy Band, With Modern Wooing
